text: Iyo haba iyi Qur’ani nyeranda hakaba muriyo imisozi yari gukurwaho canke kuriyoSi yari gusatagurika, canke abitavye Imana yabo bari kuvugishwa, mugabo si uko rero ibintu vyose nivy’Imana, mbega ntibaramenya abemeye Imana yabo y’ukuri yuko Imana iyo ibishaka ntankeka yari kurongora abantu bose, canke ivyago ntibizoreka kubashikira bamwe bahakana Imana yabo y’ukuri kubera ivyo bagize, canke hazomanuka ubu vuba no mubisagara vyabo kugeza aho hazoshika indagano y’Imana, mu vy’ukuri Imana ntita indagano yayo
